benchmark_details.name: GPT4Graph
benchmark_details.overview: We establish a benchmark across ten common scenarios to assess language modelsâ€™ capability in handling graph-related tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To setup a comprehensive comparison to show the ability of LLM in understanding graph structured data.

data.source: OGBN-ARXIV citation network and other datasets.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on task outcomes in graph understanding.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better understanding of graph-structured data.
methodology.validation: Tested on multiple graph mining tasks.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: CDLAPermissive-2.0 license for synthesized labels; MIT license for code.
